name: passible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
In the Christian religion, someone or something that is passible is able to feel emotion, pain, and suffering: He states that although Christ was passible, and able to suffer, his nature did not allow him to feel pain. They argue that any being open to experience would also have to be passible.
